plugin.name: Teak's Plunderin' Tweaks
plugin.author: TeakIvy
#comment.errors: Common error messages: (this be a comment an' will ne'er be shown in-game)
error.not_player: <red>You must be a player to use this here command!
error.not_op: <red>You must be an operator to use this here command!
error.missing_command_permission: <red>You do not 'ave permission to use this here command!
error.missing_permission: <red>You do not 'ave permission to do that there!
error.cant_get_latest_version: <red>Could not get the latest version o' Teak's Tweaks!
error.command_disabled: <red>This command been disabled by a server administrator!
#comment.metadata: Pack metadata section: (this be a comment an' will ne'er be shown in-game)
#comment.startup: Startup section: (this be a comment an' will ne'er be shown in-game)
startup.update.version_available: A new version o' Teak's Tweaks be available! V<version>
startup.update.download: Visit <url> to download the latest version!
startup.update.join_alert: <yellow>There be a new version o' Teak's Tweaks available!<newline>Click 'ere to download <gold>Teak's Tweaks v<version></gold>!
startup.lang.error.missing_language_file: <red>Could not find language file fer <lang>! Usin' <current_lang_name> (<current_lang_key>.json) instead.
startup.lang.error.fata_error_on_load: A fatal error occurred while loadin' the language file fer <lang>!
#comment.Tweaks: Tweaks section: (this be a comment an' will ne'er be shown in-game)
chunk_loaders.name: Chunk loaders
chunk_loaders.description: Drop a nether starrr above a lodestone to create a chunk loader (aka a loadstone) which keeps the chunk it be in loaded until it be broken.
confetti_creepers.name: Confetti creepers
confetti_creepers.description: There be a chance each creeper will erupt into flame, thar she blows into confetti an' do no damage to blocks.
elevators.name: Elevators
elevators.description: Drop an ender pearl above a wool block to make it into an elevator.<newline>Jump on it to warp onto an elevator o' the same color directly above.<newline>Crouch on it to warp onto one directly above.
xp_management.name: Xp management
xp_management.description: Right-click an enchantin' table with an empty bottle to fill it with some o' yer xp.
thunder_shrine.name: Thunder shrine
thunder_shrine.description: A shrine that there allows ye to create a thunder storm when offered a nether starrr.<newline>Drop a nether starrr atop a shrine to create a thunder storm.
thunder_shrine.storm_initialize: <red>A jolly storm been initiated by the ritual.
mini_blocks.name: Mini blocks
mini_blocks.description: Adds mini blocks to the game. Craft them usin' the normal block in a stonecutter.
collectible_budding_amethyst.name: Collectible buddin' amethyst
collectible_budding_amethyst.description: Allows ye to collect buddin' amethyst blocks to get the block itself.
husk_drops_sand.name: Husk drops sand
husk_drops_sand.description: Husks drop 0-2 sand upon death (makin' it a renewable resource).<newline>With looting, the amount be to the sky to 2 + the lootin' level.
always_drop.name: Always drop
always_drop.description: Allows ye to set blocks that there will always drop when broken, regardless o' the tool or enchantments used.
wandering_trader_announcements.name: Wanderin' trader announcements
wandering_trader_announcements.descripti: Announces to nearby players when a wanderin' trader spawns in the seven seas.
wandering_trader_announcements.announcem: <gold>A wanderin' trader 'as spawned somewhere on the server!
wandering_trades.name: Wanderin' trades
wandering_trades.description: Adds mini blocks & player 'eads to the wanderin' trader's trades.
armored_elytra.name: Armored elytra
armored_elytra.description: Drop an elytra an' a chestplate above an anvil to merge them into one item. Drop the item above a grindstone to separate them again.<newline>Enchantments be kept safely between mergin' an' separatin'. Burnin' netherite armored elytra will separate the items.
player_head_drops.name: Player 'ead drops
player_head_drops.description: A player will drop their 'ead when killed by another player. The item displays who the killer be.
rotation_wrench.name: Rotation wrench
rotation_wrench.description: Adds a custom wrench in-game that there allows ye to rotate redstone components, & glazed terracotta when right-clickin'.
anti_creeper_grief.name: Anti creeper grief
anti_creeper_grief.description: Prevents creepers from blowin' to the sky, blocks an' players do not take damage.
anti_enderman_grief.name: Anti enderman grief
anti_enderman_grief.description: Prevents endermen from pickin' to the sky blocks.
anti_ghast_grief.name: Anti ghast grief
anti_ghast_grief.description: Prevents ghasts from blowin' to the sky blocks.
bat_membranes.name: Bat membranes
bat_membranes.description: Disable phantoms to get membranes from bats instead.
count_mob_deaths.name: Count mob deaths
count_mob_deaths.description: Adds the ability to count the mob deaths durin' the time the system 'as started.
double_shulker_shells.name: Double shulker shells
dragon_drops.name: Dragon drops
dragon_drops.description: Makes the ender dragon drop a dragon egg an' elytra on death.
larger_phantoms.name: Larger phantoms
larger_phantoms.description: Makes the naturally spawnin' phantoms larger an' more powerful the longer ye do not sleep.
more_mob_heads.name: More mob 'eads
more_mob_heads.description: Adds a chance to receive a mob's 'ead upon killin' it.
silence_mobs.name: Silence mobs
silence_mobs.description: Adds the ability to silence mobs usin' a name tag. 'silence me'; 'silence me'; 'silence me'; 'silence_me'; be all acceptable names.
villager_death_messages.name: Villager death messages
villager_death_messages.description: Notifies the server in chat when a villager dies. Displays coordinates an' dimension that there it died in.
afk_display.name: Afk display
afk_display.description: Gray out a players name that there be not movin' fer 5 minutes.
cauldron_concrete.name: Cauldron concrete
cauldron_concrete.description: Right click a cauldron with concrete powder to 'arden it.
cauldron_mud.name: Cauldron mud
cauldron_mud.description: Right click a water cauldron with dirt to turn it into mud.
classic_fishing_loot.name: Classic fishin' loot
classic_fishing_loot.description: Reverts the fishin' loot aft to its pre-1.16 loot table.
coords_hud.name: Coords 'ud
coords_hud.description: Adds information to yer actionbarrr. Xyz coords an' a 24hr clock.<newline>Command: /ch toggle
custom_nether_portals.name: Custom nether portals
custom_nether_portals.description: Ignite nether portals o' any size or shape ye like, or usin' cryin' obsidian in the portal frame if enabled.
durability_pin'.name: Durability ping
durability_pin'.description: Get notified when ye damage an item with 10% less durability.<newline>Fully customizable per-player with '/durapin' config'
durability_pin'.pin'.subtitle.subtitle: <gold><item_type> <red>Durability low!</red> <item_durability> <red>Of</red> <item_max_durability> <red>Remainin'.
durability_pin'.pin'.title.title: <gold><item_type> <red>Durability low!
durability_pin'.pin'.title.subtitle: <gold><item_durability> <red>Of</red> <item_max_durability> <red>Remainin'.
fast_leaf_decay.name: Fast leaf decay
fast_leaf_decay.description: Leaves decay much more speed, catch some wind, lads when trees be mined in survival mode.
graves.name: Graves
graves.description: When a player dies, a grave be made at their location containin' all their items. Right-click the grave to receive yer items, an' crouch to make it so only ye can pick them to the sky.<newline>Get a grave key to unlock any grave: '/grave key'<newline>Locate yer last grave (if locatable be enabled): '/grave locate'
graves.last_grave: <yellow>Your last grave been at xyz: <gold><x> <y> <z></gold> in <gold>World: <world>
graves.key.item_lore: Right-click any grave with this here key to open it.
graves.log.created: Created a grave fer <player> at xyz: <x> <y> <z> in world: <world>
nether_portal_coords.name: Nether portal coords
nether_portal_coords.description: Adds a command that there calculates where a nether portal must be placed in the other dimension. Useful fer syncin' to the sky nether portals.<newline>Command: /portal
real_time_clock.name: Real time clock
real_time_clock.description: Adds a command that there allows ye to view 'ow long a world been runnin' in real time minutes an' 'ours.<newline>Command: /rtc
track_raw_statistics.name: Track raw statistics
track_raw_statistics.description: Adds 100+ scoreboards that there track many different statistics. Especially useful fer multiplayer.
track_statistics.name: Track statistics
track_statistics.description: Adds statistics that there be processed before-hand. E.g. Km swam, km flown, etc.
unlock_all_recipes.name: Unlock all recipes
unlock_all_recipes.description: Automatically unlock all recipes as soon as ye start playin'.
workstation_highlights.name: Workstation 'ighlights
workstation_highlights.description: Allows ye to find the workstation o' any villager by 'ighlightin' it.<newline>Command: /workstation
chat_colors.name: Chat colors
chat_colors.description: Use chat colors to make yer messages, signs, an' items look better (usin' '&' fer color codes)..
dirt_to_grass.name: Dirt to grass
dirt_to_grass.description: Convert dirt to grass by right-clickin' a dirt block with seeds.
fixed_item_frames.name: Fixed item frames
fixed_item_frames.description: Shift right-click an item frame with iron bars to make it fixed.<newline>Shift right-click an item frame with shears to make it not fixed.
insta_mine.name: Insta mine
insta_mine.description: Instantly mine certain blocks if ye 'ave a netherite tool with efficiency 5 or 'igher, an' 'aste 2 or 'igher.
invisible_item_frames.name: Invisible item frames
invisible_item_frames.description: Shift right-click an item frame with shears to make it invisible
keep_small.name: Keep small
keep_small.description: Keep a mob in its child form (if it 'as one).
lectern_reset.name: Lectern reset
lectern_reset.description: Reset a lectern's book to the first page after closin' it.
quick_commands.name: Quick commands
quick_commands.description: Quickly switch game modes, an' reply to messages.
quick_commands.message.command_descripti: Send a private message to a player.
quick_commands.reply.command_description: Reply to the last person who messaged ye.
slime_cream.name: Slime cream
slime_cream.description: Convert slime balls to magma cream by right-clickin' a lava cauldron.<newline>Convert magma cream to slime balls by right-clickin' a water cauldron.
spectator_alts.name: Spectator alts
spectator_alts.description: Allow players to add their own alt accounts as spectators.<newline>Command: /alts <add/remove/list> <alt> [player]
stair_chairs.name: Stair chairs
stair_chairs.description: Allows ye to sit on stairs.<newline>Right-click a stair with a saddle to make it a chair.<newline>Break the stair to remove the chair an' get the saddle aft.
sudoku.name: Sudoku
unsticky_pistons.name: Unsticky pistons
unsticky_pistons.description: Allow players to remove slime from pistons by right-clickin' them with an axe.<newline>Right-click a piston with a slimeball to make it sticky.
back.name: Back
back.description: Allows ye to teleport aft to yer previous location.<newline>Command: /back
homes.name: Homes
homes.description: Allows ye to set an' teleport to 'omes.<newline>Command: /home
homes.error.on_cooldown: <red>You must wait <time> seconds before teleportin' again!
spawn.name: Spawn
spawn.description: Allows ye to teleport to the seven seas spawn.<newline>Command: /spawn
tpa.name: Tpa
tpa.description: Allows ye to offer to teleport to another player.<newline>Command: /tpa
item_averages.name: Item averages
item_averages.description: Adds a marker that there tracks items flowin' past it fer 2 minutes, then calculates 'ow many o' each item will run through per 'our.<newline>Command: /itemavgerage
kill_boats.name: Kill boats
kill_boats.description: Adds an admin command to kill all boats without passengers.<newline>Command: /killboats
spawning_spheres.name: Spawnin' spheres
spawning_spheres.description: Adds a command that there allows ye to see where mobs can spawn.<newline>Command: /spawningspheres
spectator_conduit_power.name: Spectator conduit power
spectator_conduit_power.description: Easily toggle conduit power when in spectator.<newline>Command: /conduitpower
spectator_conduit_power.error.game_mode_: <red>Conduit power removed because o' game mode change!
spectator_night_vision.name: Spectator night vision
spectator_night_vision.description: Easily toggle night vision when in spectator.<newline>Command: /nightvision
spectator_night_vision.error.game_mode_c: <red>Night vision removed because o' game mode change!
#comment.crafting_Tweaks: Craftin' Tweaks section: (this be a comment an' will ne'er be shown in-game)
back_to_blocks.name: Back to blocks
back_to_blocks.description: Allows ye to craft full blocks from stairs an' slabs.
blackstone_cobblestone.name: Blackstone cobblestone
blackstone_cobblestone.description: Craft all items that there require cobblestone, usin' blackstone.
charcoal_to_black_dye.name: Charcoal to black dye
charcoal_to_black_dye.description: Allows ye to craft charcoal into black dye.
coal_to_black_dye.name: Coal to black dye
coal_to_black_dye.description: Allows ye to craft coal into black dye.
craftable_blackstone.name: Craftable blackstone
craftable_blackstone.description: Allows ye to craft blackstone or polished blackstone usin' basalt & coal/charcoal
craftable_bundles.name: Craftable bundles
craftable_bundles.description: Allows ye to craft the experimental bundle item. (usin' 1 leather an' 1 string)
craftable_coral_blocks_2x2.name: Craftable coral blocks (2x2)
craftable_coral_blocks_2x2.description: Allows ye to craft coral blocks from their coral plant in a 2x2. Both tubes an' fans may be used interchangeably.
craftable_coral_blocks_3x3.name: Craftable coral blocks (3x3)
craftable_coral_blocks_3x3.description: Allows ye to craft coral blocks from their coral plant in a 3x3. Both tubes an' fans may be used interchangeably.
craftable_enchanted_golden_apples.name: Craftable enchanted golden apples
craftable_enchanted_golden_apples.descri: Allows ye to craft enchanted golden apples usin' gold blocks.
craftable_gilded_blackstone.name: Craftable gilded blackstone
craftable_gilded_blackstone.description: Allows ye to craft gilded blackstone usin' golden nuggets an' blackstone.
craftable_gravel.name: Craftable gravel
craftable_gravel.description: Allows ye to craft gravel usin' flint.
craftable_horse_armor.name: Craftable 'orse armor
craftable_name_tags.name: Craftable name tags
craftable_name_tags.description: Allows ye to craft name tags.
craftable_small_dripleaf.name: Craftable small dripleaf
craftable_small_dripleaf.description: Allows ye to craft small dripleaf from a large dripleaf.
craftable_spore_blossoms.name: Craftable spore blossoms
craftable_spore_blossoms.description: Allows ye to craft spore blossoms usin' lilacs, azalea leaves, an' 'oneycombs.
double_slabs.name: Double slabs
double_slabs.description: Allows ye to craft 2 slabs from a single block.
dropper_to_dispenser.name: Dropper to dispenser
dropper_to_dispenser.description: Allows ye to convert a dropper to a dispenser usin' a bow, or by usin' strin' an' sticks.
log_chests.name: Log chests
log_chests.description: Allows ye to bulk craft chests usin' logs.
more_bark.name: More bark
more_bricks.name: More bricks
more_packed_mud.name: More packed mud
more_sherds.name: More sherds
more_sherds.description: Craft 2 sherds when combinin' a pottery sherd with a brick.
more_stairs.name: More stairs
more_trapdoors.name: More trapdoors
powder_to_glass.name: Powder to glass
powder_to_glass.description: Smelt all colors o' concrete powder into their respective stained glass color.
rotten_flesh_to_leather.name: Rotten flesh to leather
rotten_flesh_to_leather.description: Allows ye to smelt rotten flesh into leather.
sandstone_dyein'.name: Sandstone dyeing
sandstone_dyein'.description: Allows ye to craft sandstone with red dye to get red sandstone
smeltable_raw_ore_blocks.name: Smeltable raw ore blocks
smeltable_raw_ore_blocks.description: Smelt raw ore blocks to ore blocks.
straight_to_shapeless.name: Straight to shapeless
straight_to_shapeless.description: Craft items such as paper, hardtack, an' shulker boxes directly in yer 2x2.
universal_dyein'.name: Universal dyeing
universal_dyein'.description: Allows ye to dye any dyeable block to another color, no matter what color it be (does not include concrete).
unpackable_ice.name: Unpackable ice
unpackable_ice.description: Allows ye to break down ice into 9 pieces. 1 blue ice to 9 packed ice to 81 ice.
unpackable_nether_wart.name: Unpackable nether wart blocks
unpackable_nether_wart.description: Allows ye to break down nether wart blocks into 9 nether wart.
unpackable_quartz_blocks.name: Unpackable quartz blocks
unpackable_quartz_blocks.description: Allows ye to break down quartz blocks into 4 quartz.
unpackable_wool.name: Unpackable wool
unpackable_wool.description: Allows ye to break down wool into 4 strin'.
#comment.commands: Commands section: (this be a comment an' will ne'er be shown in-game)
afk.command_description: Toggles afk mode. When enabled, ye be automatically set to afk when ye be idle fer 5 minutes.
alts.error.no_permission_list_others: <red>You do not 'ave permission to see other's alts!
alts.error.no_permission_modify_others: <red>You do not 'ave permission to modify other's alts!
alts.error.self: <red>You cannot add yerself as an alt!
alts.error.whitelisted: <red>You cannot add a whitelisted player as an alt!
back.command_description: Teleport aft to yer previous location.
back.error.on_cooldown: <red>You must wait <cooldown_seconds> seconds between uses o' /back!
conduitpower.command_description: Toggle conduit power as a spectator.
conduitpower.error.wrong_gamemode: <red>You must be in spectator mode to use this here command!
durabilitypin'.command_description: Get pinged when yer tools drop below 10% durability.
durabilitypin'.config.ping_for_hand_item: Inculdes any item with durability in the mainhand or offhand slots.
durabilitypin'.config.ping_for_armor_ite: Inculdes any item with durability in armor slots.
durabilitypin'.config.display_title.name: Display: title
durabilitypin'.config.display_chat.name: Display: chat
home.error.cant_set_home: <red>An unknown error 'as occurred while settin' yer 'ome!
home.error.cant_delete_home: <red>An unknown error 'as occurred while deletin' yer 'ome!
home.error.no_homes_yet: <red>You don't 'ave any 'omes set! Use <gold>/home set <name></gold> to set one!
itemaverages.command_description: Calculate 'ow many items flow through a source in 2 minutes.
mechanics.command_description: View mechanics added by Teak's Tweaks.
mechanics.gui.title: Teak's Tweaks mechanics
nightvision.command_description: Toggle night vision as a spectator.
nightvision.error.wrong_gamemode: <red>You must be in spectator mode to use this here command!
portal.command_description: Calculate where a nether portal must be placed in the other dimension.
portal.error.wrong_dimension: <red>You cannot run this here command in <world>!
realtimeclock.command_description: View 'ow long a world been runnin' in real time minutes an' 'ours.
realtimeclock.world_time: <yellow>This world been active fer <gold><bold><days></bold></gold> days, <gold><bold><hours></bold></gold> 'ours, an' <gold><bold><minutes></bold></gold> minutes!
sethome.command_description: Set a 'ome to teleport to at a later date.
shrine.command_description: Create thunder shrines that there can be used to summon lightnin' storms.
spawn.error.on_cooldown: <red>You must wait <time> seconds between uses o' /spawn!
spawningspheres.command_description: Spawn a sphere to 'elp with mob spawnin'.
spawningspheres.error.invalid_color: <red>Please specify a valid color! (red, blue, green)
TeaksTweakscommand.support: <yellow>For support, join the discord, an' ask in the <gold>#<red>❓</red> | support</gold> channel: <gold><click:open_url:'<discord>'><discord></click></gold><newline>For more speed, catch some wind, lads support, run <gold><click:run_command:'/teakstweaks paste true'>/teakstweaks paste</click></gold> an' include the link in yer message.
TeaksTweakscommand.info.title: <gold>Teak's Tweaks <yellow>V<version>
TeaksTweakscommand.info.author: Author: <green><author>
TeaksTweakscommand.paste.success: <yellow>Successfully uploaded to pastebook!<newline><click:copy_to_clipboard:'<url>'><gold>Click 'ere</gold> copy the link to yer clipboard.</click><newline><click:open_url:'<url>'><gold>Click 'ere</gold> to open the link in yer browser.</click>
TeaksTweakscommand.paste.error.cooldown: <red>Teak's Tweaks paste can only be used once every 30 minutes!
test.test: <rainbow>Hello, <name>! Looks such as yerself found me test command! Rum! Spanish women! Jolly times, mateys.</rainbow>
tpahere.command_description: Request fer another player to teleport to ye.
tpa.command_description: Request to teleport to another player.
tpa.error.specify_player: <red>Please specify a player to teleport to!
tpa.error.no_pending_requests: <red>You do not 'ave any pendin' teleport requests!
tpa.error.no_outgoing_request: <red>You do not 'ave an outgoin' teleport offer!
tpa.error.player_no_pending_requests: <red>That player does not 'ave any pendin' teleport requests!
tpa.tpa.request_message: <gold><player> <yellow>Has requested to teleport to ye! <gold>Click to accept!
tpa.tpahere.request_message: <gold><player> <yellow>Has requested fer ye to teleport to them! <gold>Click to accept!
tpa.tpa.request_sent: <yellow>You 'ave requested to teleport to <gold><player></gold>. <gold>They 'ave 60 seconds to accept.
tpa.tpahere.request_sent: <yellow>You 'ave requested to teleport <gold><player></gold> to ye. <gold>They 'ave 60 seconds to accept.
workstationhighlight.command_description: Find the workstation o' any villager.
workstationhighlight.error.no_job_site: <red>The nearest villager does not 'ave a job site!
